articles.author: Maite Fernández Simon
articles.title: African and South Asian citizens fleeing Ukraine denounce racism - The Washington Post
articles.description: Several African, South Asian and Middle Eastern citizens in Ukraine have denounced instances of racism while trying to flee the shelling in the country.
articles.content:

articles.title: K-drama and Marvel actor Park Seo-joon ends COVID-19 quarantine, heads to Hungary for new film - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: He'll be working on a film called Dream, which also stars IU, about a group of people trying out for the Homeless World Cup.
articles.content:
South Korean actor Park Seo-joon is able to join the rest of the cast and crew of his upcoming movie in Hungary after he was recently released from quarantine.

articles.title: Grab shares plunge 37% after S$1.49 billion quarterly loss - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Shares in Grab tumbled 37 per cent on Thursday (March 3) after Southeast Asia's no. 1 ride-hailing and food delivery firm posted a US$1.1 billion (S$1.49 billion) quarterly loss and a worse-than-expected drop in revenue, hit by promotional offers …

articles.title: Love blossoms: S.H.E's Selina Jen confirms she is dating 6 years after divorce - AsiaOne
articles.description: TAIPEI - Selina Jen, of Taiwanese girl group S.H.E, has found new love six years after her divorce. In a poetic social media post on Thursday (March 3), she confirmed that she is dating. She wrote that a 40-year-old woman is like a flower and her new romance …
